title: Loadscreen won't open after champion select
body: I can get into the client and through champion select just fine, but once the timer ticks down and the client minimizes, the loadscreen never pops up.  I've tried relogging/restarting, but the issue remains.  Would appreciate some help.

replies.body:
Hmmm.. It sounds like your connection handoff between the champ select and gameservers is going wrong due to an *unstable connection*. I'd like you to go through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which addresses the most common network settings that cause these issues.

If you still experience these issues after taking those steps, let me know.

I also can't get past champion select.

Specific Problem: After champion select (on any game mode), the timer counts down to zero and the game tries to switch from the launcher to the game. It crashes and gives me a bug splat error. It puts me back to the launcher with the reconnect button. When I press reconnect, it does the exact same thing with the same bugsplat.

Things I have tried: 
- Clean windows boot 
- older graphic card drivers 
- updating DirectX 
- update Java 
- compatibility mode 
- run as administrator 
- turning off firewall 
- turning off anti-virus 
- uninstalling/reinstalling LoL and cleaning the registry 
- repairing LoL through launcher

None of these things in any combination seem to get me into a game. I have leaverbuster now from the ARAM games I was trying to play, so I switched to custom games to try and troubleshoot but still not luck. Any advice would be appreciated. I'm at my wits end here.
**
EDIT/UPDATE **This worked for me: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/X6sPFPu8-fps-drops-and-crashes-after-the-windows-10-anniversary-update
